name: Magnetic Drive Pumps
description: Magnetic Drive Pumps are a type of centrifugal pump that operates without a direct physical connection between the motor and the pump shaft. Instead, the pump uses a magnetic coupling to transfer energy from the motor to the pump impeller, offering significant benefits in terms of leakage prevention, maintenance, and safety.

name: Chemical Dosing Pumps
description: The Pressure Dosing Pumps is a positive displacement chemical dosing device with the ability to vary capacity manually or automatically as process conditions required.

name: Air Operated Pump
description:
We are offering Air Operated Double Diaphragm Pump.Other Details: An AODD pump is a type of positive displacement pump that uses compressed air as a power source.
The compressed air is shifted from one chamber to the other by a linked shaft that allows the chambers to move simultaneously.
This back-and-forth motion forces liquid out of one chamber and into the discharge piping while the other chamber is being filled with liquid at the same time.
These pumps use reciprocating elastomeric diaphragms and check valves to pump fluid.
The liquid chambers are filled and emptied by fluid that is drawn through a common inlet and discharged through a single outlet. Special Features: No electrical motor - non sparking.
No mechanical seals or gland packing.
The pumps can run dry indefinitely without damage.
Safe for use in hazardous / explosive environments.
Variable flow - simply regulate the inlet air supply to adjust the pump flow from zero to max.
If discharge is clogged or closed pump stops i

name: Horizontal Multistage Centrifugal Pump
description:
We are offering Horizontal Multistage Centrifugal Water Pump.Other Details: Characterised by a sturdy and compact construction. Available in various versions and models and suitable for many applications: pressure groups, water distribution and treatment, heating and air conditioning, cooling and chiller, irrigation and rainwater recovery, industrial washing and industrial systems.
Body, impellers, intermediate stages, seal holder disc and shaft (part in contact with the liquid) in AISI 304.
The standard mechanical seal is in Ceramic/Carbon/EPDM; then there is the possibility of using different types of special seals to reach a temperature range from -15°C to +110°C.
WRAS-certified for standard models up to 85°C.
It is possible to combine these pumps with 2 poles, self-ventilated, high efficiency asynchronous motors. Technical Data: IE3 high efficiency motors starting from 0.75 kW
Maximum liquid temperature: from -15°C to +85°C (standard), from -15°C to +110°C (TE version for high temp

name: Investa Chemical Process Pump
description:
We are offering Chemical Process Pump. They are constructed with semi-open impellers. They are manufactured by very specialized lost wax process for having minimum rejections with castings, having better impeller profiles in the castings resulting in optimum flow and efficiencies and delivering pumps at a speedy rate.Advantages of semi-open impellers: Can handle Slurries and solids content upto 30-40%.
All the impellers have back vanes which helps in reducing the radial and Axial Thrust on the Bearings.
With smooth flow passages and larger eye area it helps in easy flow of slurries and solids content.
Higher efficient even with slurries. Applications of Pumps: Distilleries(Fermentation and Evaporation Section)
Mineral Recovery Plants
Speciality Chemicals
Pulp and Paper industry for the transfer of Black and Green Liquor
Starch Industry
Dyes and Pigments
Chloro Alkali Plants
Pesticides and Insecticides
Fertilizers
Foods

name: Hydro pneumatic booster pumps
description: Hydro-pneumatic booster pumps are specialized systems used to maintain and boost pressure in a water supply system, often in situations where there is a need to ensure a steady flow of water at a high pressure. These pumps use both hydraulic (water pressure) and pneumatic (air pressure) systems to create a pressurized flow that can be used in various applications, including residential, commercial, and industrial settings.

name: High pressure pumps
description: High-pressure pumps are specialized pumps designed to operate under conditions where a significant amount of pressure is required to move or pump fluids through a system. These pumps are used in a wide range of industrial, commercial, and scientific applications where standard pressure pumps may not be sufficient.

name: CNP Centrifugal Pumps
description: CNP Centrifugal Pumps are a diverse range of pumps designed for various applications, including vertical multistage, horizontal multistage, and specialized pumps for specific industries like refrigeration, plastics, and HVAC.

name: Multistage High Pressure Pump
description: A specialized type of pump, the multistage high-pressure pump, is designed to generate the high pressures needed in several industries, including oil and gas, chemical processing, water treatment, and power generation. These pumps excel in applications where other pump types fail to generate the required pressure.

name: Cri High Pressure Pumps
description: CRI MULTI STAGE VERTICAL HIGH PRESSURE PUMP ARE POWERED BY A TOTALLY ENCLOSED FAN COOLED ,A.C INDUCTION MOTOR, SUITABLE FOR CONTINUOUS DUTY. SAILENT FEATURES : CORROSION RESISTANT STAINLESS STEEL GRADE PUMP PARTS ENSURE LONGER LIFE. ALL SINGLE PHASE MOTORS ARE FILLED WITH THERMAL MOTOR PROTECTORS.

name: Single Stage Centrifugal Pump
description: A single-stage centrifugal pump is a pump with a single impeller that transfers rotational energy into hydraulic energy to move fluids. It's a simple and common pump design, easily manufactured and maintained, making it suitable for various applications like water supply, wastewater treatment, and chemical processing.

name: End suction pumps
description: An End Suction Pump is a type of centrifugal pump where the liquid enters the pump from one end (the suction side) and exits from the top or the discharge side of the pump casing. This design is one of the most common and widely used types of pumps in various industries, especially for handling clean or mildly contaminated fluids. These pumps are typically used for water transfer, HVAC systems, irrigation, and other industrial applications.

name: Non Metallic Centrifugal Pump
description: A Non-Metallic Centrifugal Pump is a type of pump that uses non-metallic materials for the construction of key components, such as the casing, impeller, and wear rings, instead of metals like stainless steel or cast iron. These pumps are designed to handle fluids that are corrosive, abrasive, or otherwise harmful to metals, making them ideal for specific applications in industries like chemicals, food processing, pharmaceuticals, and water treatment.

name: PVDF Chemical Process Pump
description: We are offering PVDF Chemical Process Pump. The fluorinated polymers are widely appreciated for their remarkable chemical inertness and their excellent resistance to aging. Polyvinylidene Fluoride (PVDF) offers the specific advantage of easy processing in accordance with all the conventional methods used in plastic industry.

description:
Ingersoll Rand Albin France Peristaltic Pumps for slurry transfer, dosing, filter press feeding, beer filtration systems. Dry running application. Negative suction self priming operation. For catalyst, industrial process slurry transfer/recirculation/dosing, etc. Also available in: Size: 10-150 mm
Motor Power: 1-10 HP
Pump Capacity: 50-200 LPH
